about_the_game:
Inspired by old school arcade shooters, mixed with roguelike elements, Drill Dash is set in a post-apocalyptic world where mech-equipped drillers are launched from railgun platforms into a vast environment full of destructive raiders, haywire robots and mutated locals. To survive this harsh landscape, you are equipped with a massive rocket propelled drill arm which enables you to defend yourself as you drill underground and through the air in search of the all important Loot.

Smash through obstacles and enemies alike in this procedurally generated world as you venture further into hostile lands. Collect Loot and return to base to upgrade your drill suit to take on tougher challenges you'll encounter on your runs.
Travel far enough and you'll encounter power bosses blocking your way forward who will test your skills and reward you with tons of Loot.
See if you have what it takes to survive, upgrade and drill your way to riches and glory!

To survive this harsh landscape, you are equipped with a massive rocket propelled drill arm which enables you to defend yourself as you drill underground and through the air in search of the all important Loot.

Smash through obstacles and enemies alike in this procedurally generated world as you venture further into hostile lands. Collect Loot and return to base to upgrade your drill suit to take on tougher challenges you'll encounter on your runs.
Travel far enough and you'll encounter power bosses blocking your way forward who will test your skills and reward you with tons of Loot.
See if you have what it takes to survive, upgrade and drill your way to riches and glory!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Pop!_OS.
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 | Intel Core i5 4460
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 | AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Pop!_OS.
  • Processor: Core i7 6700K | Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 950 | AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS El Capitan
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5600M GPU
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS El Capitan
  • Processor: M1 Pro
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 5600M GPU
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
